mapper.select: SELECT A.*,B.USER_NAME FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(NOTICE_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS NOTICE_DT ,USER_ID ,NOTICE_TYPE ,CASE WHEN NOTICE_TYPE=0 THEN '작업공지' WHEN NOTICE_TYPE=1 THEN '기타공지' ELSE '장애공지' END AS NOTICE_TYPE_NM ,NOTICE_TITLE ,CONTENT ,FLAG_EMAIL ,FLAG_SMS FROM NOTICE_INFO WHERE NOTICE_ID=#{NOTICE_ID} )A LEFT JOIN USER_INFO B ON(A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID)

SELECT CONCAT( 'NT' ,LPAD(IFNULL(MAX( SUBSTR(NOTICE_ID,3,2) ),-1)+1,2,'0') ,DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m%d') ) FROM NOTICE_info a WHERE 1=1 AND NOTICE_DT >= CURDATE() AND NOTICE_DT < CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY
